about_the_game:
A fantasy world like no other! Runa & the Chaikurú Legacy invites you to discover the mysteries buried deep in the ruins of the ancient Chaikurú civilization, in a classic and epic 3D adventure platformer.

With action elements and several areas to explore, immerse yourself in a fascinating but also dark story, facing the mysteries hidden by The Company in this game full of fun puzzles and a gameplay for the whole family.



STORY
A great story awaits you! Immerse yourself in the Red Lands to understand the mysterious Chaikurú civilization and unravel all its ancient secrets. You will have to put yourself in the shoes of the brave Runa to face different threats that will seek to complicate our mission.



3D PLATFORM
Get ready to enjoy an unforgettable adventure full of excitement and challenge with our amazing 3D platformer, designed especially for lovers of classic video games on Steam!



EXPLORATION
Discover a vast and wonderful world ready to be explored! Inspired by the beautiful scenery and culture of Latin America, different landscapes await you to play at your own pace, whether you are trying to find all the collectibles or looking for ways to solve the challenges.



INCLUDES
- A classic 3D adventure platformer game, with action and exploration elements, and automatic camera movements.
- Join Runa, a curious and courageous adventurer, in her journey.
- Uncover the mysteries of the ancient Chaikurú civilization and the Four Mystic Seeds in the vast space of Red Lands.
- Explore the beautiful environments composed of ruins, jungles, rivers, waterfalls, caves and more!
- Fight against varied and fantastic enemies mastering the use of your boleadoras!
- Overcome 3D platform obstacles and solve puzzles left by the Chaikurú to guard their secrets.
- Unlock mystical skills to alter the environment and reach new scenarios.
- Collect ancient and wacky artifacts from an old world.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7th / AMD Ryzen 3rd
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1030 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 8
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT or superior
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Runa & the Chaikurú Legacy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7th / AMD Ryzen 3rd
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1030 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 8
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 12400 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600 or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT or superior
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A fantasy world like no other! Help Runa uncover the mysteries buried deep in the ruins of the ancient Chaikuru civilization, in a classic and epic 3D adventure platformer.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
